Title: Note From a Lookout
Text:
You missed your shift again, Cole! I'm not waiting around for you like I did yesterday. I'm heading back to my shack, grabbing a few drinks, and getting some sleep. I've done my part of the shift. If Talos starts asking questions, don't expect me to take the fall.

I'm off. I'm sure you know how to disarm the traps. Just follow the directions of the drawings on the ground. When the Runner brings in the new recruits, don't forget to open the gates for them.
